EngageManifest.Title: Serene Rotator
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide's content at 948px wide by 278px tall.

This template features image content displayed in a bordered frame with the slide title and description (content) overlayed in a semi-transparent black box to the left. Pager items are located to the lower left below description content.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Serene, but can be used with any skin. The template was designed with fixed dimensions intentially; to change the dimensions of the template, simply open up the style.css and alter away!

Due to this templates fixed height and width, it is best to edit your images and content to control the output.
